apps.name: SideStore

versions.localizedDescription:
Pre-release build

 - Uses my personal anisette server as default
 - Uses my app source as default
 - Currently very broken, waiting on upstream fixes

apps.localizedDescription: SideStore is an AppStore alternative that let's you sideload other apps.

permissions.usageDescription: SideStore periodically refreshes apps in the background to prevent them from expiring.
Allows SideStore to run longer than 30 seconds when refreshing apps in background.

apps.name: Delta
apps.subtitle: Classic games in your pocket.
apps.versionDescription:
NEW
• Fixed app freezing when using Hold Button feature
• Fixed re-activating held inputs

PREVIOUS BETAS
• Supports Split View and Stage Manager multitasking on iPad
• Optimized full screen-width controller skins when using Split View, Slide Over, or Stage Manager
• Fixed using Xbox controller analog sticks as D-pad inputs
• Fixed remapping analog sticks
apps.localizedDescription:
The next consoles for Delta are coming: this beta version of Delta brings support for playing Nintendo DS and Sega Genesis games!

Please report any issues you find to support@altstore.io. Thanks!

permissions.usageDescription: Allows Delta to use images from your Photo Library as game artwork.

versions.localizedDescription:
NEW
• Fixed app freezing when using Hold Button feature
• Fixed re-activating held inputs

PREVIOUS BETAS
• Supports Split View and Stage Manager multitasking on iPad
• Optimized full screen-width controller skins when using Split View, Slide Over, or Stage Manager
• Fixed using Xbox controller analog sticks as D-pad inputs
• Fixed remapping analog sticks

apps.name: XPatcher
apps.subtitle: Allows you to apply patches to files on your iOS devices
apps.versionDescription: Apply patches to files. Useful for ROM Hacks
apps.localizedDescription: GUI front-end for flips, libppf, xdelta, and libRUP patching libraries This app allows you to apply patches to files on your iOS devices , mostly used to apply rom hacks to video game roms With a simple to use interface to make it as user-friendly as possible

versions.localizedDescription: Apply patches to files. Useful for ROM Hacks

news.title: Caution!
news.caption: This is a custom pre-release build! Use at your own risk!

news.title: LitStore GitHub
news.caption: Check out the GitHub page for this project

news.title: Delta Gaining DS Support
news.caption: Available this Saturday for patrons, coming soon for everyone else.

news.title: Delta Now Available
news.caption: Finally, relive your favorite NES, SNES, GB(C), GBA, and N64 games.

news.title: Sideloading is Here!
news.caption: Update to AltStore 1.3 to install any app directly from Files.

news.title: iOS 13.4 Fixes App Crashes
news.caption: Update to iOS 13.4 to fix some sideloaded apps crashing on launch.

news.title: Clip Now Available!
news.caption: Finally, a clipboard manager that can run in the background — no jailbreak required.

news.title: Delta, Meet Nintendo DS
news.caption: Update to Delta 1.3 to relive all your favorite Nintendo DS games.

news.title: #StandWithUkraine
news.caption: Find out how you can help support those impacted by the Russian invasion.

news.title: The Biggest AltServer Update Yet!
news.caption: Update to AltServer 1.5 to use AltJIT and other exciting new features.

news.title: More Apps in AltStore!
news.caption: Update to AltStore 1.5 to easily download some of our favorite apps.

news.title: New to AltStore?
news.caption: Check out our updated guide to learn how to sideload apps!

news.title: More Trusted Sources!
news.caption: Please welcome Provenance and PojavLauncher to AltStore 🎉
